product.longDescription: One of our fastest-growing microgreens! Uniform, medium-green leaves with pink stems. Micro radish leaves add spicy flavor, visual appeal, and bulk to mixes. Based on our yield trial, we recommend seeding 24.5 gm per tray at approx. 1 flat per oz of seed. Avg. days to maturity was 8 days when harvested at the first true leaf (as opposed to cotyledon) stage. Avg. 54,600 seeds/lb.
product.shortDescription: Spicy radish flavor, attractive pink stems and green leaves.

Radish, Red Arrow Microgreen Seed

Product ID:3111M.263111M
Zoom Image

Radish, Red Arrow Microgreen Seed

Product ID:3111M.263111M

One of our fastest-growing microgreens! Uniform, medium-green leaves with pink stems. Micro radish leaves add spicy flavor, visual appeal, and bulk to mixes. Based on our yield trial, we recommend seeding 24.5 gm per tray at approx. 1 flat per oz of seed. Avg. days to maturity was 8 days when harvested at the first true leaf (as opposed to cotyledon) stage. Avg. 54,600 seeds/lb.
